Item.name: Swimsuit
Item.description: A swimsuit that provides no protection, but makes the wearer more nimble through the water.

Item.name: Speed Device
Item.description: Makes you REALLY fast. Anomalous-ass thing can't be stored anymore, except for you.

Item.name: Riot Vest
Item.description: A vest for protection against large crowds.

Item.name: Separatist Diving Suit
Item.description: A modified combat diving suit made by the separatists to show what faction they are apart of. Comes with extra armor plating.
